name: compass-no-new-tabs
description: Microsoft Edge extension to improve navigation on Compass Education platforms

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run validate
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json content.js popup.html popup.js dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating manifest...' && node -e "const manifest = require('./dist/manifest.json'); console.log('Manifest valid:', manifest.name);"
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
